### ğŸ§  AI Agent Directives

This section is for AI agents to understand the context and potential fixes.

*   **Project Type:** Static HTML/Markdown documentation.
*   **Technology Stack:** Primarily HTML, CSS, JavaScript (if any dynamic features exist), Markdown.
